text: I suggest you learn the basics of image processing from this playlist before jumping on to OpenCV. Things like kernel, filtering, etc. are clearly explained in this one: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=06OHflWNCOE&list=PLboJFH3ATn0yC9uLuRLhaezUvtVPLtQvv  @sentdex: It would be great if you could add this link in the description of your OpenCV videos. The first time I saw your videos, I got lost because I did not know the basics of image processing. Now, whatever you say makes total sense after learning the basics.
